rooms.Name: Lost at sea
rooms.Description:
You have run into the biggest storm you have ever seen! Waves crash against
your boat and soak you to the bone. You look around for any signs of shore
and see nothing but the darkness of the storm.
  But you feel you must go on, and quickly decide which way to go from here.

rooms.Name: Lost at sea
rooms.Description:
Boy it's raining! The term 'in buckets' seems to reflect this storm
perfectly. The sea itself is really getting rough, and waves are crashing
into your boat and soaking you to the bone. (And you just showered too!)
  Looking about, the only thing you can see is darkness, and of course the
rain. You start to wonder if venturing out to the sea was such a good idea
in the first place...

rooms.Name: Lost at sea
rooms.Description:
You still can't see anything, and the storm seems to be getting worse.
You start to wonder if you'll ever make it to shore again as all you 
can see is the storm with no light in sight. You then see a 15 foot wave
about to crash into your boat, and think "I was safer at home!"

rooms.Name: Lost at sea
rooms.Description:
Your stomach is queezy, you face is green, and right now the term 'wet'
does not begin to describe how wet you really are. As you feel a cold 
comming on, you figure that you'd better stick this storm out, as you
think hope may come soon. (Unless that light you're seeing now is not the exit
of the storm, but the light at the end of the tunnel...)

rooms.Name: Lost at sea
rooms.Description:
Your strength is failing, your vision is weak, and you're getting really
ticked off at this storm! It's not like most tropical storms where you
get tossed about while on a 3 hour tour, no, but for some reason you beleve
this is no natural storm. (Or mabey thats just you imagination playing
tricks on you...) 
  Time seems to stand still as you do feel the storm easing a bit, but still
feel like a tossed salad. Mabey land is close by?

rooms.Name: Lost at sea
rooms.Description:
The rain has tapered off to a heavy shower, but the clouds still hide the
horizon. Still you press on, hoping that somewhere out here in this land of
water, there is a small spot of land to find, and castaway (hint, hint)
all the problems of the real world of adventuring.

rooms.Name: The beach
rooms.Description:
You made it! You have reached dry land! You kneel down and kiss the sand
you stand on. (Choking out sand a few moments later...) You then look
about at the beach you're on. Well, its sandy, and to your east is the 
wreck of another boat with large gaping holes in the side. You make out
the words SS MINNOW on its side and try to remember where you've heard
that name before.
  The beach continues to the west and to the northeast as far as you can
see. But you can't help but wonder what's in the wrecked boat...

rooms.Name: Inside the SS MINNOW
rooms.Description:
You stand inside the wreck of the SS MINNOW and looking around, you would 
have to say it really is a wreck! Junk lays scattered about this area, 
including pieces of splintered wood, chunks of glass and metal, and shreds
of some sort of material which you believe to be sail.
  However, you hear a silent silthering sound behind you and turn to see
5 very large snakes creaping towards you, eyeing you as their next meal...

ExtraDescs.Description: Its wood alright, yep....wood, no questions there....plain old wood.

rooms.Name: On the Beach
rooms.Description:
You are on a seemingly never ending stretch of beach, which runs from west
to east.

rooms.Name: Along the beach
rooms.Description:
Its hot, damn hot!, Real hot! Hot enough to cook eggs on cement! (If
you knew what cement was...but that wont be invented for a while yet.)
You get the picture, and to make matters worse, the beach looks like it
has no end to it. It just keeps going, and going, and going...

rooms.Name: Along the beach
rooms.Description:
Well, its a beach, its a very LONG beach, and you wonder when the forest
which seems immpenatrable will show a weak point, or prehaps a trail of
somesort..

rooms.Name: Along the beach
rooms.Description: You are on a stretch of beach which seems to never end...

rooms.Name: Along the beach
rooms.Description:
You knew you should have brought some sun block with you, cause this sun
is REALLY hot! Your face and any other exposed part of your body is a bright
red colour and hurts like hell! But still you press on, wondering if there 
is any life on this island.

rooms.Name: Along the beach
rooms.Description:
The sun is at its peek now, and it must be about 40 degrees out here!
(110 degrees in the states..;) But BOY is it hot...it's so hot you'd love
to take off all your armor, and jump in the ocean, but your curiosity wants
to know if there is any life on this island.

rooms.Name: Along the beach
rooms.Description:
You are still traveling along a VERY long beach which seems to go on 
forever. There is very few signs of life besides the obvious vegitation
of the forest which is immpassable even by the finest trained rangers.

rooms.Name: Further along the beach
rooms.Description:
You now have made the decision that you will never cook another thing in
an oven again, because now you know how it feels to be under the broiler!
But still, you've gone this far, you might as well keep on going till you
find whatever it is you expect to find...

rooms.Name: Further along the beach
rooms.Description:
You feel you are getting closer to you destination, where ever that place
is, and you REALLY hope it was worth this long, painful walk along the beach.

rooms.Name: Further along the beach
rooms.Description:
Why are you here? Why are you baking you brains out in the sun for so
long? Why are you talking to yourself? You don't really know!!! Right now
the only thing pushing you on is the hope you'll find food, water, and 
living people. So you push on...

rooms.Name: Further along the beach
rooms.Description:
Its been a long walk but you finally see an inlet up ahead. Just a few
more moments, and you'll be in what looks to be a lagoon.

rooms.Name: Further along the beach
rooms.Description:
You are in the HOT sun without sunscreen, this is not a very good idea
you have chousen by going to this place, as you are literally baking inside
your armor. But, you feel you must press on...

rooms.Name: Further along the beach
rooms.Description:
It's really starting to get hot out here, probably right now about 40
degrees out in the shade. Good thing you brought a full canteen with you,
isn't it? Oh, you forgot to? Oh...Thats not a good thing...

rooms.Name: Further along the beach
rooms.Description:
You've almost made it! Up ahead you can see where the inlet starts of some
sort of lagoon! Mabey there's life there somewhere? Anywhere is better then
in this sun!

rooms.Name: Towards the lagoon
rooms.Description:
Well, you've travelled through tropical storms, blistering heat, and
dehydration to make it this far, a mear 10 feet away is the beginning of
the lagoon! However, one small (or large) obstacle still stands
before you, for 5 feet in front of you stands a large ape-like man
who does not look too happy about seeing you here. In fact you don't really
like the way he's slowly taking aim at your face...

rooms.Name: Towards the lagoon
rooms.Description:
Well through a tropical storm, a baking sun, and general fatigue you've made
it. You can see the beginning of the lagoon no more than 10 feet from you.
  But, standing a mear 5 feet in from of you is a large ape-like man thing.
And he dosn't look too friendly to me, in fact you dont really enjoy the 
way he's taking aim with his spear at your face...

rooms.Name: On the western edge of the lagoon
rooms.Description:
You now find youself in the shade of the lagoon's trees which surround
and block out the sun. It's still hot here but not like it was on the beach.
As you look towards the south, you notice a large bamboo gate. Mabey thats
where the survivors of the ill-fated boat are!

rooms.Name: Southeastern bank of the lagoon
rooms.Description:
Well, you're almost there, looking down to the south you see a bamboo
door shrowded in shadows. This comfirms your idea that there is life on this island!
  Will the natives be friendly though?

rooms.Name: Southeastern bank of the lagoon
rooms.Description:
The trees suround you here as you walk along the beach on the lagoon.
Shadows seem to come alive, and the noises from the jungle are unfriendly
at best! Hungry, wet, and tired, you stumble towards the bamboo door
to the west.

rooms.Name: On the western edge of the lagoon
rooms.Description:
As you walk along this beach, you keep hearing unnerving sounds from
the forest. A movment here, a snapping twig there, you start to wonder
if you're beeing stalked by some creature in the forest. 
  Suddenly, a large black cat leaps out at you from the bush, and you
find yourself in another battle for your life!

rooms.Name: On the western edge of the lagoon
rooms.Description:
The lagoon is dark and black here, and you wonder what foul creatures
might reside in such a place. You are curious at first, but somthing
large and snake-like seems to move through the water, so you decide
to proceed to the bamboo gate. (Prehaps a tad quicker now...)

rooms.Name: Entrance to the castaway's huts
rooms.Description:
You've made it! You stand at a large bamboo gate which stands 3 metres
high, and hides what ever is in side this wall. A large key hole is set
at about 4 feet up on the gate. You start to wonder "Where is the key?".
  You look to your left and right, but see only rocks, some large, some 
small, but all movable. Hmmm.

rooms.Name: Southeastern bank of the lagoon
rooms.Description:
The jungle here is a bit quieter then it was, but the lagoon is just filled 
with life! In fact, looking down into the lagoon's black water, you see somthing stir, and suddenly jump back as a HUGE creature almost grabs you with one of its tentacles! You suddenly find yourself in a battle with an evil lagoon creature!

rooms.Name: Inside the food hut
rooms.Description:
You look around this small little hut and see three chests, each clearly
labled as to what's inside each of them. The hut itself is dark and again
like most of the stuff in this village, is made of bamboo.

rooms.Name: Among the huts
rooms.Description:
This is a basic intersection in the village. You look to the north and 
smell an awful smell....ugh! Wonder what it is?

rooms.Name: Among the huts
rooms.Description:
You are at a junction in the village which is as bamboo filled as the rest 
of it. To the north is a door clearly labled "OUTHOUSE", and a great stench
emits from this place...you wonder if they actually have plumbing here on
the island.

rooms.Name: Inside the Howell's money hut
rooms.Description:
You are inside the Howell's treasure hut, where they keep all their stash.
Mountains of gold and jewels lay scattered about here, and you cant help
but wonder why would the Howell's keep their money locked away on an island
without anything to buy...

rooms.Name: Around the fire pit
rooms.Description:
You are standing around the castaway's fire pit where they sing dance and 
play. As well as eat all the fruit on this island. There is a large pile o
wood on the ground here, and an axe to cut it with. Also here is the door to a small hut to the east

rooms.Name: Among the huts
rooms.Description:
You are outside two huts doors. One to the west and one to the south.
You can hear giggling and laughing from the western hut and you read two
names on the door: Ginger and Mary Anne. Should you invade their privacy? You've always wanted to
meet Ginger in person so....

rooms.Name: Gilligan and The Skipper's hut
rooms.Description:
You have entered a hut with alot of sailing paraphenalia laying about.
In the centre of the hut, you see two hammocks hung between two poles,
and then you see thier users. Two men stand here, one quite large, and the
other quite skinny. But both annoyed with your presents here.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks nasty....very VERY black there....you might get hurt...

rooms.Name: Among the huts
rooms.Description:
You are outside a hut (to the east), and all you can hear from within
are sleeping noises made from two people. You then see two names on the
door: Gilligan and The Skipper's hut.
Do you dare enter?

rooms.Name: Among the huts
rooms.Description:
You are at another intersection in the village where you can go north, 
east, or south. Looking around you see a hut to the east and another to the
south. Which should you investigate first?

rooms.Name: Inside a small hut
rooms.Description: You are in an empty hut. There is nothing here but dust and sand.

rooms.Name: Among the huts
rooms.Description:
You are outside a hut to the south where you can hear bubbling noises
emiting from within. Around this area is all types of scientific equipment
Both crude and original, mostly made of bamboo.
   You then hear a shout come from within: "I've finally created the potion
to get us off this island!!!!!"
Hmmmmm.....

rooms.Name: Among the huts
rooms.Description:
You are at a junction in the village where you can go north or west. 
Looking to the west you see some scientific equipment about a hut.
I wonder whos hut that could be?

rooms.Name: Gilligan's hold
rooms.Description:
you're fallllllllllling!!!!!!!!
OUCH! THAT HURT!
You're at the bottom on a large hole and realize thiers nothing here!
Nothing at all! Oh well, at least theres a ladder here to exit the hole...

rooms.Name: The Howell's hut
rooms.Description:
You have entered what appeared to be a bamboo hut on the outside, but 
turns out to be looking like a billionare's mansion on the inside. The hut
is much bigger then it looks, and it would appear that you may have annoyed
the Howell's who live here.
  Candles and lamps adorn this room, as do what ever decorations the two
could create to make their hut look a little like home.

rooms.Name: The outhouse
rooms.Description:
You are in the outhouse of the castaways, and you almost puke from the
stench in here! There are a few leafs here to be used as toilet paper, and
the closest thing to describe this place is 'a hole in the ground'.
One thing is for certain, no plumbing exists here!

rooms.Name: The Skipper's hold
rooms.Description:
You have entered into the Skipper's private hold, it is VERY dark!  You
can barely see your hand in front of your face, even with your light blazing.
You see some relics here from the MINNOW, and also the Skipper's treasure
pile.  Perhaps the Skipper's been scamming some money off the Howell's....

rooms.Name: The Professor's hut
rooms.Description:
You look around and notice you have walked into a laboratory of some sort
Makeshift beakers and stills are set up creating potions of unknown kinds.
In the corner of the room a tall man in a white overcoat stands up at
your entrance, and bids you welcome to his laboratory.
As with the rest of the village 90% of all the equipment is made out of
bamboo, and you suspect this man created most of it.

rooms.Name: Mary Anne and Ginger's hut
rooms.Description:
You have entered an all girl hut! You should be ashamed of yourself!
This is where Ginger the movie star and Mary-Anne the shy girl next door
type person live. Ginger of course has 'glamorized' her section of the
room with whatever style she percieves to be this next 'fad'.
Mary-Anne's area is clean, tidy, and well-kept.
  This whole room smells of perfume and sweet essence.
Both Mary-Anne and Ginger are startled by your appearance here.

rooms.Name: Among the huts
rooms.Description:
You find yourself at another intersection in the bamboo village, as there
is a door to the west and south. To the west you hear rather snooty voices of upper-class persuation.

rooms.Name: Spinning in the whirlpool
rooms.Description:
You start to notice that the water moves around in a circle here.
You then figure out that this is not a good sign...as you have heard that
whirlpools can suck you right underwater without mercy, so you make one last
chance to dive out of the whirlpool! You must decide quickly, be sucked
under, or flee!

rooms.Name: Among the huts
rooms.Description:
You've just entered into the village of the famous castaways from what
you now know as Gilligan's Island. Why do you know this? There is a BIG sign
here saying so... No activity can be seen around the village, and all you
are wondering now is where are all the members of the boat?
There is a BIG sign here.

ExtraDescs.Description:
Printed in LARGE letters is this:

           WELCOME TO GILLIGAN'S ISLAND
           HOPE YOU HAVE FUN HERE!

                              SIGNED,
                                     RAPEAD, AND GILLIGAN

rooms.Name: Down into the whirlpool
rooms.Description:
Hold yer breath! You're going under! Well, what can you say, here you are
underwater, holding your breath, hoping to find a way back up to the surface
before your air runs out. Looking around, you see a slight glow come from
an underwater cave below, you figure its a good idea to check it out, as
your air is running out.

rooms.Name: Nessy's lair
rooms.Description:
OWCH! THAT HURT!.....sike.... ;)

  You find yourself in an underwater air pocket, which glows magically.
The cave which surrounds you is huge! And shadows dance around fooling
your eye. Then you wonder...What or who lives in this place?
  You shutter to think about it, and slowly look for a way out.

rooms.Name: The back of the lair
rooms.Description:
You find yourself in the back of the cave, shadows are more pronounced
here and you think you see things in the darkness move....but thats just
your imagination running away from you...isint it?
But mabey that tall shadow in the background there doesn't like you looking
in his locker....
